item.title: mandelrust
item.description: i basically wanted to have a random zoom on an interesting mandelbrot point because: i wanted to try out rust in an aws lambda function i wanted to build that lambda function with cdk i was kinda hyped to use rust after reading about it what i learned i think i like aws better than gcp. i really really really like rust and will keep using it as much as i can i will never ever find mandelbrot set uninteresting if you’re into it, you can find the source code in here
